title.zh: 南昌：血友病女性家属关爱检测公益活动
title.en: Nanchang: Hemophilia Female Family Members Care Testing Charity Activity

description.zh: 南昌血之友公益协会赴南昌市开展血友病女性家属关爱检测公益活动，延续「携带者检测援助」项目，帮助了数个家庭、十多位家庭成员、5位女性做凝血因子检测。
description.en: Nanchang Hemophilia Association went to Nanchang City to conduct charity testing activities for female family members of hemophilia patients, continuing the 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project and helping several families, more than ten family members, and 5 women with coagulation factor testing.
